message: Week6.json ALREADY COMPLETE with high-quality explanations. All 45 questions across 4 topics have proper "explanation" object with "correct" field (30-60 words) and "incorrect" object with per-choice explanations (20-40 words). All explanations cite concepts/researchers, explain WHY (not just WHAT), and pass 5-Second Quality Rule. File location: study-site/src/data/weeks/week6.json (1313 lines).
